text: If I have an html template to which I would like to include a changeable background how would I go about doing this?
I think I found the solution the minute I asked :smile: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/export-to-template-context>
would be cool if updating linked assets updated the design preview

in design previews it’d be nice if the viewport presets  could have togglable “frames” I had no idea when I switched to mobile it would pop in a phone frame, and the frame is abstract enough and similar in design enough to the page I’m working on I thought I screwed up something in my code, frames like this are cool and give perspective, but they can also get in the way if you cant disable them.
